txt.en:
Dear [placeholder],

This is your invitation to the Harvestmath Festival! Bring this note to the Shire, and I shall introduce you to all of the excellent and exciting events being offered this year. (And I will make sure to show you the exciting new door that has appeared at the Party Tree!)

Sincerely yours,

  Opal Goodbody
'Do you see the door? Do you see it? Isn't it exciting? What could be behind it, I wonder?'

This autumn's Harvestmath Festival is upon us once again, and you have been formally invited to participate in this year's exciting events.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
Talk to Opal Goodbody at the Party Tree
Opal Goodbody can be found at the Party Tree in Hobbiton, a fair Shire-town.\n\nYou should speak with Opal Goodbody, who will illuminate this year's festival events for you.
